TopicTitle: Water glitches, please fix in next update

Articles.Content:
So...
One of my planes crash for kerbal science purposes, when I decide to make a boat. The boat makes it on water, but as soon as I switch cameras, the game goes insane, wings flip around, the camera spawns 2 meters away, and the whole structure of the boat I made went to waste. The only mod was Hyperedit, but I wasn't even using it. Help? :)
Please test without hyperedit Zawmbbeh, this sounds like something hyperedit will do.
Craft files, pictures, and/or saves would also be greatly helpful. Otherwise it's a matter of stabbing in the dark.
